mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD (BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, USER_IDX) VALUES (#{BOARD_TITLE}, #{BOARD_CONTENT}, #{USER_IDX})
mapper.select: SELECT B.BOARD_IDX, B.BOARD_TITLE, U.USER_ID AS WRITER_NAME, B.CREATED FROM BOARD B JOIN USERS U ON B.USER_IDX = U.USER_IDX ORDER BY B.BOARD_IDX DESC
SELECT B.BOARD_IDX, U.USER_ID AS WRITER_NAME, B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_CONTENT FROM BOARD B JOIN USERS U ON B.USER_IDX = U.USER_IDX WHERE BOARD_IDX = #{BOARD_IDX}
